name: Cats Evolution Space Adventure
description:
The spaceship filled with cats has found a new big planet for colonization! Modules with cats are landing from the orbit to the surface! Lead the catkind to the prosperity with this cat clicker game!
Use your magic alchemy skills to create new cat breeds! Evolution of cats in another galactic conditions can surprise you! New monster cats like dragon cat, spotted serval, penguin cat or dolphin cat are waiting for you! Enjoy cat evolution in this furry cats at space exploration game! Help them to evolve and collect the entire collection of cosmic cats!
Rush into the sweet cats game right now! Combine kitty cats from Cats Go – just drag one to another, merge them and get the new species! Test your breeding skills at the new planet!
The whole galactic world of cats is waiting! Start the new era of cat’s domination with your favorite pets from Cats GO!

Features:
- Famous cats from the Cats GO – now in space!
- Cat evolution game on the new planes – leave the Earth and conquer the -
galaxy
- Merge cats and gather the largest collection of the cat creatures!
